case.name: Australian Communications and Media Authority v Mobilegate Ltd A Company Incorporated in Hong Kong (No 3) [2009] FCA 1154 (29 September 2009)

citphrases.citphrase: proceedings instituted in fair work division
whether jurisdiction of court to be exercised in both fair work division and general division
whether direction necessary from chief federal magistrate allocating matter to fair work division or general division. courts and tribunals

citances.sentence: [34] Siminton ALR at 414 per Kirby J; HCA at para.7 per Kirby J. [35] Australian Communications and Media Authority v Mobile Gate Ltd a company incorporated in Hong Kong (No. 3) [2009] FCA 1154 at para.4 per Logan J. [36] Maddison ALD at 393-396 per Wilson FM; FMCA at paras.13-30 per Wilson FM. [37] Zentai v O'Connor & Ors [2009] FCA 1597 ; (2009) 263 ALR 511 at 515 per McKerracher J; [2009] FCA 1597 at paras.22-23 per McKerracher J.
